nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices

Class WebServiceContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.webservices.WebServiceContext

  • public class WebServiceContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The context for a given web service call
    Author:
    luis

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  WebServiceContext.ContextType

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        Returns true if the web service context has been initialized. This method doesn't ensure that the context is ready for use.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        por ejemplo, cuando ocurre un error en un in-interceptor necesitamos inicializarlo con el soap message de entrada para que los fault interceptors puedan trabajar.

        public static boolean isPosContext()

      • isReadyForUse

        public static boolean isReadyForUse()
        Returns true if the web service context has been initialized and is ready to be used by POS or Web Service Client.
        Returns:

      • set

        public static void set(Member member,
       javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Sets the thread local's current context.
        The context for a REST web service operation is initialized by this method

      • set

        public static void set(Pos pos,
       javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
       org.apache.cxf.binding.soap.SoapMessage soapMessage)
        Sets the thread local's current context.
        The context for a POS web service operation is initialized by this method
        In case of POS web service the web services clients are not used.

      • set

        public static void set(ServiceClient client,
       javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
       org.apache.cxf.binding.soap.SoapMessage soapMessage)
        Sets the thread local's current context.
        It's invoked for those web services using a web service client.

      • set

        public static void set(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContextOf,
       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest requestOf,
       org.apache.cxf.binding.soap.SoapMessage message)
        Sets the thread local's current context.
        It's invoked when there's neither a POS or web service client, but minimal information like the request.

      • setRestMember

        public static void setRestMember(Member member)
        Only allowed for REST context. Updates the member
